column5: The Hakutaku is a wise
column6: chimerical beast resembling a white ox with nine eyes and six horns. It is said to be a good omen
column7: symbolizing good luck and possessing great knowledge about all things in creation.

column5: Hari onago is a yōkai from Japanese folklore known as Hook Girl. She appears at night in Shikoku
column6: targeting young men with her hook-like hair and brutal attacks.

column6: long black hair

column5: The Hyōsube is a squat
column6: hairy humanoid creature found primarily on Kyūshū and in West Japan. It has a malicious smile and sharp teeth
